summary: The customer was interested in purchasing a phone from Contoso Wireless and asked about the payment options available. The agent informed them of the various payment options, including credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, bank transfer, and cash. The customer then asked about the phones offered by Contoso Wireless and the agent provided them with details about the models available, including the iPhone 11 Pro Max. The agent then sent a link to the product page so that the customer could take a closer look at the features and specifications before making a decision.
